abstract: The move to Federal District Court from United States Bankruptcy Court could result in the dismissal of some lawsuits against prominent banks and limit the amount the Madoff trustee, Irving H. Picard, can recover for investors.
snippet: The move to Federal District Court from United States Bankruptcy Court could result in the dismissal of some lawsuits against prominent banks and limit the amount the Madoff trustee, Irving H. Picard, can recover for investors.
lead_paragraph: When it comes to the Madoff bankruptcy case, the venue matters.

headline.main: In Shift to New Court, Risks for Madoff Trustee’s Case
